column4: Hi! How can I connect with telnet to my Thomson SpeedTouch ADSL modem? telnet 192.168.1.1 works in Windows XP Pro, but not on Ubuntu! :(
specify a port perhaps?
it's the default telnet port I think (23)... it's just Trying... no luck
what's the error you're getting?
no error... just "Trying..."
turn on extra verbose with ''-vv' flag
i'm nearly certain the problem is that you're not running the right command rather than it being broken, maybe check out some telnet examples
I did: "telnet 192.168.1.1"
that's usually not correct; defaults are implied
yre you telling me that Windows has different defaults of telnet command?
what port is your router expecting?
maybe it guesses which ports are open
not sure :( I guess it's 23
nmap your router
nmap 192.168.1.1 will suffice
open ports are ftp, http, https and pptp...
did you find the port number?
no... but my open ports are 21, 80, 443 and pptp port
try -O
it should tell you the port name beside the port
-O flag? on telnet?!
no on nmap
